member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Sms.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms
member.summary: Represents class for sending sms messages addressed to group recipients

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name property.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the sms message text
member.value: Sms message text value as string

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.SendToGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets comma separated list of recipients group ids for sms message
member.value: Comma separated list of recipients group ids for sms message

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Users
member.summary: Gets the users

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Groups
member.summary: Gets the groups

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.SmartSearches
member.summary: Gets list of SmartSearch containing Id and Name information

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Created
member.summary: Gets or sets the "Message created" datetime stamp

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Updated
member.summary: Gets or sets the Message updated datetime stamp

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.CreatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of user who created sms message
member.value: Id of user who created sms message

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.UpdatedBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of user who was the last who modified sms message
member.value: Id of user who was the last who modified sms message

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.RecipientCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the recipients number

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.DeliveredMessagesCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the delivered sms messages amount

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.FirstMessageSent
member.summary: Gets or sets the "first message sent" datetime stamp

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.LastMessageSent
member.summary: Gets or sets the "last message sent" datetime stamp

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the sms message class

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.FillRow(System.Data.DataRow)
member.summary: Fills data row with message data for further data persistence layer processing.
member.param: Data row witj sms message data

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.Fill(System.Data.IDataReader)
member.summary: Fills the sms message properties with data from persistence layer
member.param: Data reader with sms message data

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.GetMessageById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the sms message by identifier

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.GetSmsMessages
member.summary: Gets the SMS messages

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms.GetSmsMessagesBySql(Dynamicweb.Data.CommandBuilder)
member.summary: Gets the SMS messages using CommandBuilder.
member.param: Command builder encapsulating sql-query to persistence layer with sms messages data

member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Sms.SendHandler
member.summary: Represents class that handles messages sending operation

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.SendHandler.Send(Dynamicweb.Sms.Sms)
member.summary: Sends the specified message text
member.returns: Returns true if message was successfully sent to all recipients

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.SendHandler.Send(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends the specified message text
member.param: The phone to send the message to

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.SendHandler.Send(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Sends the specified message text.
member.param: The phone to send the message to
The parameters to merge into the message in the format @key = value
member.returns: Returns a value indicating the success or failure of the operation

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Sms.SendHandler.FormatPhoneNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Cleans the phone number for +, spaces, and ()
